reqs.Bleeds: Perform all provokes of a kill in melee distance and clear them effectively
reqs.Heal Other: Crack healing and usage of Heal Other during cade cepts
reqs.Cade Cept: Cade cept at all required times
reqs.Climber: Climb in P1 and provoke Vorago at 36 seconds
reqs.Target Cycle: TC in combination with any fast ability on phase 3 and 5 (no running)
reqs.Recenter: Recentering P2 from any location with any walking direction
reqs.Natty: Natty without lost ticks until TC
reqs.Bleed Skip: Perform a Bleed skip on Ceiling Collapse
reqs.Solo Lure: Solo lure with south BD at 30,6 seconds
reqs.Hammer Climber: Hammer on TC and perform a climb (final platform at 33s)
reqs.Advanced Climber: Hammer on TC and perform an accelaration climb (final platform at 28,8s). Can be done in a separate clip

tiers.name: Trio HM
reqs: Achieve a Trio HM kill on any rotation (1/6)
apps: VOD of a successful Trio HM kill

tiers.name: Duo HM
reqs: Achieve a Duo HM kill on any rotation (1/6)
apps: VOD of a successful Duo HM kill

tiers.name: Duo HM 6/6
reqs: Achieve a Duo HM kill on every rotation (6/6)
apps: VOD of a successful Duo HM kill on every rotation

tiers.name: Solo Vorago
reqs: Achieve a Solo Phase 5 on any rotation (1/4)
apps: VOD of a successful Solo Phase 5

tiers.name: Forever Alone
reqs: Achieve a Solo Phase 5 on every rotation (4/4)
apps: VOD of a successful Solo Phase 5 on every rotation

tiers.name: NM Exp
reqs:
Achieve TWO of the following timers OR achieve ONE of the timers on b2b kills
Ceilings `10:15`
Scopulus `10:00`
Vitalis `10:45`
Green Bomb `10:15`
Team Split `10:30`
The End `11:05`
apps: A vod of a P1 climb (36s + voke, can be done solo)

**AND** VODs of one kill on two different rotations with their specific timers
 or: VOD of b2b kills with one of the timers achieved (average)

tiers.name: Duo T1
reqs: Inherited skill requirements from `.info NM Exp`

Achieve TWO of the following timers OR achieve ONE of the timers on b2b kills
Ceilings `11:00`
Scopulus `10:45`
Vitalis `11:00`
Green Bomb `11:00`
Team Split `11:00`
The End `11:30`
apps:
One of the following:
- VODs of one kill on two different rotations with their specific timers
- VOD of b2b kills with one of the timers achieved (average)

apps:

tiers.name: Duo T3
reqs: Inherited skill requirements from `.info Duo T2`

Achieve TWO of the following timers OR achieve ONE of the timers on b2b kills
Ceilings `09:15`

Vitalis `09:22`

Team Split `09:55`

apps:

tiers.name: Duo T4
reqs: Inherited skill requirements from `.info Duo T3`

Achieve ONE of the timers
Ceilings `08:40`
Scopulus `09:02`
Vitalis `08:52`
Green Bomb `09:01`
Team Split `09:15`
The End `09:42`
apps: VOD of one kill complying with one of the time requirements

tiers.name: Certified HM
reqs: 3 KPH as Base Tank or Bomb Tank
Utilize Adrenaline potions and Ultimates at all necessary times
apps: A VOD of a P1 climb (36s + voke). Not needed if you hold NM Tiers
**AND** a VOD of 1 kill as the respective role on pace for 3 KPH

tiers.name: Experienced HM
reqs: Inherited skill requirements from `.info Certified HM`
3 KPH as Base Tank or Bomb Tank
Significantly contribute to progressing DPS phases
apps: VOD of 1 kill as the respective role, on pace for 3 KPH

tiers.name: Advanced HM
reqs: Inherited skill requirements from `.info Experienced HM`

Achieve both timers OR achieve ONE of the timers on b2b kills
Any rotation `14:26`
The End `15:03`
apps:
One of the following:
- VODs of one kill on two different rotations with their specific timers
- VOD of b2b kills with one of the timers achieved (average)

tiers.name: Insane HM
reqs: Inherited skill requirements from `.info Advanced HM`

Achieve both timers OR achieve ONE of the timers on b2b kills
Any rotation `12:39`
The End `13:16`
apps:
One of the following:
- VODs of one kill on two different rotations with their specific timers
- VOD of b2b kills with one of the timers achieved (average)

tiers.name: Experienced Duo HM
reqs: One kill must be 20:00 or faster
apps: VOD of 1 full kill complying with the kill time

tiers.name: Advanced Duo HM
reqs:
Average kill time in Duo HM on b2b kills (any rotation)
Any rotation `18:30`
The End `19:07`
apps: VOD of two b2b kills complying with the average kill time

tiers.name: Insane Duo HM
reqs:
Average kill time in Duo HM on b2b kills (any rotation)
Any rotation `15:39`
The End `16:16`
apps: VOD of two b2b kills complying with the average kill time
